meanings.sent1: I had to respray the fence to cover the missed spots.
meanings.sent2: The artist decided to respray the canvas with a different color.
meanings.sent3: After the rain, the kids had to respray their chalk drawings on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent4: She resprayed her hair with glitter for the party.
meanings.sent5: The gardener had to respray the plants to protect them from pests.

meanings.definition: A second or subsequent application of spray paint.
meanings.sent1: The car needed a respray to fix the peeling paint.
meanings.sent2: The graffiti artist applied a respray to enhance the colors of the mural.
meanings.sent3: The respray of varnish on the furniture made it look brand new.
meanings.sent4: The respray of paint on the walls brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The respray of lacquer on the table gave it a glossy finish.
